original_text: The men of Judah asked them, ‘Why have you come to attack us?’ The Philistines replied, ‘We have come to catch Samson and take him as our prisoner. We need to punish him in the same way that he has punished us.’
korean_text: 유다 사람들이 이르되 너희가 어찌하여 올라와서 우리를 치느냐 그들이 대답하되 우리가 올라온 것은 삼손을 결박하여 그가 우리에게 행한 대로 그에게 행하려 함이로라 하는지라

sentences.original_text: The men of Judah asked them
Why have you come to attack us?
We have come to catch Samson
and take him as our prisoner
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그를 우리의 포로로 삼으려 합니다

sentences.original_text: in the same way that he has punished us
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 우리를 벌한 것과 똑같은 방법으로
